page.title: 19INFORMATION SYSTEMS/WOODLAND
page.content: We have a{mobile library}and a{school library. The nearest{public libraries are in Barnard Castle - 7 miles away and Bishop Auckland - 10 miles away. You can also borrow records at these libraries. The{mobile library}calls every fortnight but it can be affected by public holidays and bad weather. There are story books and non-fiction books. It is a good service for older people. Mobile libraries only come out into the country districts. Old people do not have to go into town and get books. Bigger schools like{Secondory Schools generally have big libraries. There is a lot of information in{our school {library}as well as story books.The most popular books in our library are about dinosaurs and wildlife.
